dmca.title: Kentners Catering Company Claims Copying by Competitor (#2)
dmca.body:
April 6, 2004 Google, Inc. Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints [Private] Mountain View. CA 94043 Re; Notice of Infringement Dear Google Customer Support Professionals, The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.business-consulting-success.com/consulting/ sample-wedding-consultant-business-cards.html In this instance, the text is on a white background and is a verbatim copy of the text of our corporate web page. This includes unauthorized use of our company name. The search query on the infringing page Is "Kentner Catering" and "Kentners Catering' Infringing webpage: http://www.business-consulting-success.com/consulting/ sample-wedding-consultant-business-cards.html contains two instances of text that has been copied from Kentners website. #1 Copied from Kentners web page: http://www.kentnerscatering.com/event_wedre4.html Infringing text: Kentner Catering Wedding Reception at Halton Regional Museum
Family business since 1974. Flavorful and Kentners Catering wedding consultant. Please feel free to browse through the sample packages shown. Major credit cards are accepted During #2 - Copied from Kentners web page http://www.kentnerscatering.com/event_wedre3.html Kentners Catering Weddinq Reception at Country Heritage park
Family business since 1974. Flavorful and Kentners Catering wedding consultant. Please feel free to browse through the sample packages shown. Major credit cards are accepted During We first became Aware Of this Infringement upon review of one of your google Alert e-mails to my associate, [private]@simpatico.ca. I am attaching a copy of this e-mail for your reference. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. I swear, under penalty at perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed If there is any difficulty with this Notice of Infringement, can we please Receive a telephone call at xxx-xxx-xxxx or can you provide us with a number to call I will get in touch. Thank you for your assistance with this matter. Sincerely, [Private] The Kentners Social Catering Ltd. info@kentnerscatering.com
[below see the email received by my associate [private]@sympatico.ca] Date:31 Mar 2004 00:11:34
